content:
Francesco Acerbi assures he is ‘not afraid’ of coronavirus and that Lazio winning Serie A would be ‘fantastic’ but warns ‘we mustn’t hurry’.
Italy remains in a state of nationwide lockdown, despite the curve of COVID-19 cases beginning to flatten out, but Ac… [+1459 chars]
